name: Your Only Move Is Record
desc:
Screenshot and record replays with a handful of options available.
Note: This requires FFmpeg, but you can easily download it from the mod.

This should also be compatible with Custom Character Loader, Mod Options, Post Processing, and Audio Volume Sliders.

If you need any help, you can ask me (Snazzah#0371) in https://discord.gg/yomimodding
